00001 #include "cthread.h"
00002 #include <pthread.h>
00003 #include <stdio.h>

00005 #ifdef NO_TLS
00006 static pthread_key_t tls_key;
00007 #else
00008 __thread CTHREAD *tls_thread;
00009 #endif
00010 
00011 #ifdef NO_TLS
00012 #define GET_TLS()  (CTHREAD *) pthread_getspecific( tls_key );
00013 #define SET_TLS(val)  (CTHREAD *) pthread_setspecific( tls_key, val );
00014 #else 
00015 #define GET_TLS()  tls_thread
00016 #define SET_TLS(val) do { tls_thread = val; } while( 0 );
00017 #endif

00020 static uint32_t next_tid;
00021 
00022 int CTHREAD_libinit()
00023 {
00024 #ifdef NO_TLS
00025   pthread_key_create( &tls_key, 0);
00026 #endif
00027   return 0;
00028 }

00030 void cthread_init( CTHREAD *arg )
00031 {
00032   arg->proc( &arg->caller_to_thread_value );
00033   
00034   arg->state = CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT; 
00035 
00036   STACKS_release( arg->stack_entry );
00037 
00038 #if 0
00039   setcontext( &arg->context_caller );
00040 #endif
00041 }
00042 
00043 typedef void (*MK_CTX_FUNC) (void);
00044 
00045 CTHREAD * CTHREAD_init( STACKS *stacks, CTHREAD_PROC proc )
00046 {
00047   void *stack;
00048   CTHREAD *ret;
00049   int stage = 0;
00050 
00051   ret = (CTHREAD *) malloc( sizeof(CTHREAD) );
00052   if (!ret) {
00053     return 0;
00054   }
00055   stage = 1;
00056 
00057   if (VALUES_init(&ret->thread_to_caller_value)) {
00058     goto err;
00059   } 
00060   stage = 2;
00061 
00062   if (VALUES_init(&ret->caller_to_thread_value)) {
00063     goto err;
00064   } 
00065   stage = 3;
00066 
00067   stack = STACKS_get( stacks, &ret->stack_entry );
00068   if (!stack) {
00069     goto err;
00070   }
00071   stage = 4;
00072 
00073   ret->proc = proc;
00074 
00075   ret->prev_thread = 0;
00076 
00077   ret->thread_id = -1;   
00078   ret->state = CTHREAD_STATE_INIT;
00079 
00080 
00081   if (getcontext( &ret->context_coroutine )) {
00082     if (ret->state == CTHREAD_STATE_INIT) {
00083       goto err;
00084     }
00085     return 0;
00086   }
00087 
00088   ret->context_coroutine.uc_stack.ss_sp = ret;
00089   ret->context_coroutine.uc_stack.ss_size = STACKS_get_stack_size( stacks );
00090 
00091 
00092   return ret;
00093 
00094 err:
00095   if (stage > 3) {
00096     STACKS_release(ret->stack_entry);
00097   }
00098   if (stage > 2) {
00099     VALUES_free(&ret->caller_to_thread_value);
00100   }
00101    if (stage > 1) {
00102     VALUES_free(&ret->thread_to_caller_value);
00103   }
00104   if (stage > 0) {
00105     free(ret);
00106   }
00107   return 0;
00108 }

00110 static int do_start( CTHREAD *thread )
00111 {
00112   thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING;
00113   
00114   thread->thread_id = ++next_tid;
00115   
00116   thread->prev_thread = GET_TLS();  
00117   SET_TLS( thread );
00118 
00119 #if 0
00120   thread->context_coroutine.uc_link = 0;
00121 #else 
00122   thread->context_coroutine.uc_link = &thread->context_caller;
00123 #endif
00124   makecontext( & thread->context_coroutine, (MK_CTX_FUNC) cthread_init, 1, thread);
00125   
00126   setcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00127 
00128  
00129   // should not get here.
00130   return -1;
00131 }
00132 
00133 int CTHREAD_start( CTHREAD *thread, VALUES **rvalue, const char *format , ... )
00134 {
00135   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_INIT) {
00136     return -1;
00137   }
00138   getcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00139   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00140     // got here when the running thread called yield for the first time, or exited without calling yield.
00141     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED;
00142     if (rvalue) {
00143      *rvalue = &thread->thread_to_caller_value; 
00144     }
00145     return 0;
00146   }
00147   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00148     // got here from thread that has exited.
00149     if (rvalue) {
00150      *rvalue = &thread->thread_to_caller_value; 
00151     }
00152     return 0;
00153   }
00154 
00155   if (format) {
00156     va_list vlist;
00157     
00158     va_start( vlist, format );
00159     
00160     if (VALUES_printv( &thread->caller_to_thread_value, format, vlist ) ) {
00161       return -1;
00162     }
00163   } 
00164   return do_start( thread );
00165 }

00170 int CTHREAD_join( CTHREAD *thread, VALUES **rvalue )
00171 {  
00172    if( thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_INIT ||
00173        thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00174      return -1;
00175    }
00176    while(thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00177      CTHREAD_resume( thread, rvalue, 0 );
00178    }
00179    return 0;
00180 }
00181 
00182 int CTHREAD_resume( CTHREAD *thread, VALUES **rvalue, const char *format, ... )
00183 {
00184   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED) {
00185     return -1;
00186   }
00187 
00188   getcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00189   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00190     // got here when the running thread called yield for the first time, or exited without calling yield.
00191     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED;
00192     if (rvalue) {
00193      *rvalue = &thread->thread_to_caller_value; 
00194     }
00195     return 0;
00196   }
00197   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00198     // got here from thread that has exited.
00199     if (rvalue) {
00200      *rvalue = &thread->thread_to_caller_value; 
00201     }
00202     return 0;
00203   }
00204 
00205   if (format) {
00206     va_list vlist;
00207     
00208     va_start( vlist, format );
00209     
00210     if (VALUES_printv( &thread->caller_to_thread_value, format, vlist ) ) {
00211       return -1;
00212     }
00213   } 
00214 
00215   SET_TLS( thread );
00216   
00217   return setcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 int CTHREAD_yield(VALUES **rvalue, const char *format, ... )
00222 {
00223   CTHREAD *thread;
00224   
00225   thread = GET_TLS();
00226 
00227   if (!thread) {
00228     return -1;
00229   }
00230 
00231   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00232       return -1;
00233   }
00234 
00235   getcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00236   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00237     // got here when this thread was resumed.
00238     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING;
00239     if (rvalue) {
00240      *rvalue = &thread->caller_to_thread_value; 
00241     }
00242     return 0;
00243   }
00244  
00245   if (format) {
00246     va_list vlist;
00247     
00248     va_start( vlist, format );
00249     
00250     if (VALUES_printv( &thread->thread_to_caller_value, format, vlist ) ) {
00251       return -1;
00252     }
00253   } 
00254 
00255   SET_TLS( thread->prev_thread );
00256  
00257   return setcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 int CTHREAD_free( CTHREAD *thread )
00262 {
00263   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00264     return -1;
00265   }
00266   free(thread);
00267   return 0;
00268 }
00269 
00270 uint32_t CTHREAD_get_tid()
00271 {
00272   CTHREAD *thread;
00273  
00274   thread = GET_TLS();
00275   if (!thread) {
00276     return (uint32_t) -1;
00277   }
00278   return thread->thread_id;
00279 }
00280 
00281 int CTHREAD_set_return_value( const char *format, ... )
00282 {
00283   CTHREAD *thread;
00284   va_list vlist;
00285   
00286   thread = GET_TLS();
00287   if (!thread) {
00288    return (uint32_t) -1;
00289   }
00290 
00291   va_start( vlist, format );
00292   return VALUES_printv( &thread->thread_to_caller_value, format, vlist );
00293 }
